files.content:
--- a/libsrc/META	2015-01-15 15:21:20.991565330 +0100
+++ b/libsrc/META	2015-01-15 15:21:42.333564587 +0100
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 name="Missinglib"
-version="0.0.1"
+version="0.4.1"
 description="Utility libraries for OCaml"
-requires="str"
+requires="str unix"
 archive(byte)="missinglib.cma"
 archive(native)="missinglib.cmxa"
files.name: meta-0.4.1.patch

files.content:
diff -ru missinglib.0.4.1/Makefile.setup missinglib.0.4.1/Makefile.setup
--- missinglib.0.4.1/Makefile.setup	2004-06-05 17:45:01.000000000 +0200
+++ missinglib.0.4.1/Makefile.setup	2012-10-05 18:14:52.729673166 +0200
@@ -16,7 +16,7 @@
 # Foundation, Inc., 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA  02111-1307  USA
 #
 
-OCAMLFLAGS := -warn-error A
+OCAMLFLAGS := -w -a
 
 ifndef OCAMLMAKEFILE
   OCAMLMAKEFILE := $(PATHTOTOP)/contrib/OCamlMakefile/OCamlMakefile
files.name: opam.patch
